definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: desire—cstr. [[אַוַּת]] De 12:15 + 5 t.; sf. [[אַוׇּתִי]] Ho 10:10—desire, will, usually sq. [[נֶפֶשׁ]]; of natural human desire (morally indiff.), for meat De 12:15, De 12:20, De 12:21; of longing for sanctuary De 18:6; of royal good pleasure 1Sa 23:20; without [[נֶפֶשׁ]], of wild-ass Je 2:24; of divine will Ho 10:10.
